attributes.action: Deploy the army and use armed weapons of force to tackle rioting and civil disorder
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the very recent events in Tottenham and other areas of London, Bristol and Liverpool, the government should stop talking and do something about it.

This petition proposes that in the event of rioting and civil disorder, our Armed Forces be immediately brought back from wherever they are and be deployed to tackle the situation. They and the police should be allowed to use whatever force is necessary to restore law and order and maintain it.
